service.name: PRP Injections

seo.title: PRP Injections in Westfield & Carmel, IN | RELUXE Med Spa
seo.description: Platelet-Rich Plasma (PRP) uses your own growth factors to rejuvenate skin and support healing. Popular for under-eyes and skin glow.

overview.p1: PRP concentrates your own platelets to deliver growth factors where you want rejuvenation—popular around eyes and for overall glow.
overview.p2: We draw, spin, and place PRP precisely or pair it with microneedling for a luminous, refreshed appearance.

whyReluxe.title: Strict processing
whyReluxe.body: Consistent PRP concentration for reliable outcomes.

whyReluxe.title: Targeted placement
whyReluxe.body: Gentle technique for delicate zones like under-eyes.

whyReluxe.title: Smart combos
whyReluxe.body: PRP synergizes with SkinPen for texture and radiance.

service.tagline: Use your own growth factors to rejuvenate.

howItWorks.title: Consultation
howItWorks.body: We review your goals, history, and design a personalized plan.

howItWorks.title: Treatment
howItWorks.body: Quick, precise session performed by our experts.

howItWorks.title: Aftercare
howItWorks.body: Simple steps for best results. We check in with you.

flexEverything.intro: Popular add-on to microneedling and under-eye rejuvenation.

faq.a: Most patients describe mild, brief discomfort. We can use numbing when appropriate.
Some results are immediate; full effect often appears by 1–2 weeks depending on service.
